name: No style
description: Not a martial art, this is just plain old punching and kicking.
initiate: You decide to not use any martial arts.
%s enters a generic combat stance.

name: Force unarmed
description: Not a martial art, setting this style will prevent weapon attacks and force punches (with free hand) or kicks.
initiate: You force yourself to fight unarmed.
%s decides to fight unarmed.

name: Aikido
description: Aikido is a Japanese martial art focused on self-defense, while minimizing injury to the attacker.  It uses defensive throws and disarms but lacks offensive tehcniques.
initiate: You enter the hamni stance.
%s changes into a relaxed combat posture.

static_buffs.name: Aikido Stance
static_buffs.description: By disregarding offensive in favor of self-defense, you are better at protecting. Blocked damage reduced by 100%% of Dexterity.

static_buffs.name: Intermediate Aikido
static_buffs.description:
An intermediate aikido practitioner can protect themselves against multiple opponents.

+1 Block attempts, +1 Dodge attempts.

static_buffs.name: Advanced Aikido
static_buffs.description:
An advanced aikido practitioner can protect themselves against even more opponents than normal.

+1 Block attempts, +1 Dodge attempts.

name: Boxing
description: Sport of the true gentleman, modern boxing has evolved from the prizefights of the Victorian era.  Strength reduces blocked damage and moving increase dodge skill.
initiate: You lower your chin and raise your fists to eye level.
%s prepares to fight with raised fists.

static_buffs.name: Boxing Stance
static_buffs.description:
A solid stance allows you block more damage than normal and deliver better punches.

+2 Bash damage, Blocked damge reduced by 50%% of Strength.

onmove_buffs.name: Footwork
onmove_buffs.description:
You are make yourself harder to hit by bobbing and weaving as you move.

+1.0 Dodge skill.
Lasts for 1 turns.  Stacks 2 times.

ondodge_buffs.name: Counter Chance
ondodge_buffs.description:
You've seen your chance. Now strike back!

+25% Bash damage.
Lasts for 1 turn.

name: Brawling
description: You're used to hand-to-creature fighting.  You know how to fight when unarmed or with any weapon to a certain extent.  It's not stylish or sporting, but it gets the job done.
initiate: You grit your teeth and prepare for a good fight.
%s gets ready to brawl.

name: Capoeira
description: A dance-like style with its roots in Brazilian slavery, Capoeira is focused on fluid movement and sweeping kicks.  Moving briefly enables stronger techniques.  Missing an attack grants bonus damage for a short time.
initiate: You begin performing the ginga.
%s begins to rhythmically rock back and forth.

static_buffs.name: Capoeira Stance
static_buffs.description:
You never stop moving while performing the ginga.  This makes you very mobile while fighting.

+1.0 Dodge skill, +1 Dodge attempts.

onmiss_buffs.name: Capoeira Tempo
onmiss_buffs.description:
You didn't miss, it's just part of the dance and the best part is about to start!

+15%% Bash damage.
Lasts 2 turns.  Stacks 3 times.

onmove_buffs.name: Capoeira Momentum
onmove_buffs.description:
You can feel the rhythm as you move.  Not only are you harder to hit, but your kicks are even more amazing!

+1.0 Dodge skill.
Enables "Spin Kick" and "Sweep Kick" techniques.
Lasts 3 turns.

name: Crane Kung Fu
description: One of the five Shaolin animal styles.  The Crane uses intricate hand techniques and jumping dodges.  Dexterity determines your damage, rather than Strength; you also receive a dodge bonus move or dodge an attack.
initiate: You raise your leg slightly and balance like a crane.
%s assumes a crane-like stance.

static_buffs.name: Crane's Precision
static_buffs.description:
Your attacks strike at your opponents weakness with speed and percision instead of brute force.
Dexterity increases melee damage instead of Strength.

Bash damage increased by 75%% of Dexterity but decreased by 75%% of Strength.

onmove_buffs.name: Crane's Flight
onmove_buffs.description:
Just like a bird, you take to the air to avoid danger.

+1.0 Dodge skill.
Lasts 2 turns.

ondodge_buffs.name: Crane's Grace
ondodge_buffs.description:
Much like the crane, you a quick to avoid danger.

+1 Dodge attempts, +1.0 Dodge skill.
Lasts 2 turns.

name: Dragon Kung Fu
description: One of the five Shaolin animal styles.  The Dragon uses fluid movements and hard strikes.  Intelligence improves your accuracy instead of Dexterity.  Your attacks lead to counterattacks which disable your opponents and set them up for a powerful finishing move.
initiate: You relax and patiently await conflict like the great dragon.
%s assumes a dragon-like stance.

static_buffs.name: Dragon's Knowledge
static_buffs.description:
You plan your attack far in advance relying on your intution instead of your speed to strike true. Intelligence increases Accuracy instead of Dexterity.

Accuracy increased by 25%% of Intelligence but decreased by 25%% of Dexterity.

onhit_buffs.name: Dragon's Flight
onhit_buffs.description:
Life and combat are a circle.  An attack leads to a counter and to an attack once again.  Seek to complete this loop.

+1 Accuracy, +2 bash Damage.
Enables "Dragon Vortex Block" and "Dragon Wing Dodge"
Lasts 1 turn.

name: Eskrima
description: Eskrima, also known as Kali, is a Filipino martial art.  It emphasizes rapid strikes with knife and baton weapons, along with a variety of improvised substitutes.
initiate: You enter an open guard stance and prepare to strike.
%s enters an open stance.

static_buffs.name: Eskrima Stance
static_buffs.description:
You are skilled at getting the most out of your weapons.  The term 'weapon' might be very subjective,

+2 Accuracy.

oncrit_buffs.name: Eskrima Combination
oncrit_buffs.description:
You can follow up a critical hit with a stronger attack if the opportunity presents itself.

+15%% bonus to all damage.
Enables "Combination Strike" technique.
Lasts 3 turns.  Stacks 3 times.

name: Fencing
description: The noble art of fencing is taught with flexible competition blades, but the techniques are derived from (and applicable to) more functional examples.  Skilled fencers can take advantage of blocks and feints to deliver accurate strikes.
initiate: You move into the en-garde stance.
%s moves into a fencing stance.

static_buffs.name: Fencing Stance
static_buffs.description:
Your side stance minimizes the chances you will be harmed in a combat.

Blocked damage reduced by 50%% of Dexterity.

onblock_buffs.name: Parry
onblock_buffs.description:
Your next strike will find it's mark much easier from your parry.

+1 Accuracy.
Lasts 1 turn.

onmiss_buffs.name: Remise
onmiss_buffs.description:
Your feint is the perfect setup for a devistating followup attack!

+1 Accuracy.
Enables "Compound Attack" technique.
Lasts 1 turn.

name: Fior Di Battaglia
description: Medieval Europe's martial techniques for fighting with polearms.  The "Flower of Battle" places great focus on countering one's opponent and knocking them down before landing a killing blow
initiate: You hold your weapon in a firm grip, ready to block any attack.
%s grips their weapon tightly.

static_buffs.name: Stand Your Ground
static_buffs.description:
You stalwart and will not budge against any threat.

+2 Block attempts, -1.0 Dodge skill, blocked damage reduced by 50%% of Strength.

onmove_buffs.name: Tactical Retreat
onmove_buffs.description:
You moved and nullified the effects of Stand Your Ground!

-2 Block attempts, +1.0 Dodge skill, blocked damaged increased by 50%% of Strength.
Lasts 1 turn.

onmiss_buffs.name: Tactical Feinting
onmiss_buffs.description:
They fell for your feint!

Enables "Hook and Drag" technique.
Lasts 1 turn.

onblock_buffs.name: Defense Break
onblock_buffs.description:
Each successful block reveals an opening in your opponent's guard.

+1 Accuracy.
Lasts 1 turn.  Stacks 3 times.

name: Judo
description: Judo is a martial art that focuses on grabs and throws, both defensive and offensive.  You are resistant to most effects that can knock you down and can counter grab and takedown attacks with strong judo throw.
initiate: You prepare yourself for a grapple.
%s prepares for a grapple.

static_buffs.name: Judo Stance
static_buffs.description:
Your knowledge of grappling allows you to recover from knock down effects instantly.
In addition, you can counter grabs and takedown attacks with a judo throw.

name: Karate
description: Karate is a popular martial art, originating from Japan.  It focuses on rapid, precise attacks, blocks, and fluid movement.  A successful hit allows you an extra dodge and two extra blocks on the following round.
initiate: You adopt a classic karate stance.
%s adopts a classic karate stance.

static_buffs.name: Karate Stance
static_buffs.description:
Your no nonsense stance allows you hit more accurately.

+2 Accuracy.

onhit_buffs.name: Karate Strike
onhit_buffs.description:
Landing a hit allows you to perfectly position yourself for maximum defense against multiple opponents.

+2 Block attempts, +1 Dodges attempts, blocked damge reduced by 50%% of Strength.
Lasts 2 turns.

name: Krav Maga
description: Originating in Israel, Krav Maga is based on taking down an enemy quickly and effectively.  It focuses on applicable attacks rather than showy or complex moves.  Popular among police and armed forces everywhere.
initiate: You assume a practical combat stance.
%s assumes a practical combat stance.

static_buffs.name: Krav Maga Stance
static_buffs.description:
Your training makes it easier to land hits and fight multiple opponents.

+1 Accuracy, +1 Block attempts.

name: Leopard Kung Fu
description: One of the five Shaolin animal styles.  The Leopard focuses on rapid, strategically planned strikes.  Perception improves your accuracy instead of Dexterity.  Moving increases dodge skill and accuracy further.  Attacking after moving increases damage.
initiate: You prepare to pounce like a lepoard.
%s assumes a leopard-like stance.

static_buffs.name: Leopard's Strategy
static_buffs.description:
You fight by overwhelming your opponents with speedy strikes that are much harder to defend against.
Dexterity increases melee damage instead of Strength.

Bash damage increased by 75%% of Dexterity but decreased by 75%% of Strength.

static_buffs.name: Leopard's Agility
static_buffs.description:
Just like a cat, you are quick, agile, and hard to pin down.

+1.0 Dodge skill.

onmove_buffs.name: Leopard's Stalk
onmove_buffs.description:
You proudly stalk the shadows and preparing to pouce with unrelenting fury.

+2 Accuracy.
Enables "Leopard's Pounce" buff.
Lasts 1 turn.

onmove_buffs.name: Leopard's Pounce
onmove_buffs.description:
You are ready.  Attack and claim your prey!

+25% bonus to all damage.
Lasts 1 turn.

name: Medieval Swordsmanship
description: The art of the longsword and sword & shield, preceding the later development of fencing.  Designed for combat both unarmored and in armor, it includes grappling as well as defensive and offensive sword techniques.  This treatise compares the Italian and German traditions of medieval combat with detailed step-by-step pictures.
initiate: You take on a knightly stance.
%s takes on a knightly stance.

static_buffs.name: Swordsman's Stance
static_buffs.description:
Through chivalry and vigilance, your defense with a blade has increased.

+1 Dodge attempts, blocked damage decreased by 50%% of Strength.

onblock_buffs.name: Deflection
onblock_buffs.description:
You deflected your enemy's attack and now they are open to a counterattack!
Enables "Sweeping Strike" and "Deathblow" techniques.
Lasts 1 turn.

oncrit_buffs.name: Manslayer
oncrit_buffs.description:
Your powerful attack has given you the chance to end this fight right now!
Enables "Vicious Strike" techniques.
Lasts 1 turn.

name: Muay Thai
description: Also referred to as the "Art of 8 Limbs," Muay Thai is a popular fighting technique from Thailand that uses powerful strikes.  Your strength decreases blocked damage.  Blocking attacks or getting hit will increase your damage and blocked damage further.
initiate: You perform a short wai khru in honor of your teachers.
%s performs a short war-dance.

static_buffs.name: Muay Thai Stance
static_buffs.description:
Strength is everything in Muay Thai and you know how to make the most of yours.

Blocked damage decreased by 50%% of Strength.

ongethit_buffs.name: Determination
ongethit_buffs.description:
Taking a hit will not slow you down.  You will outlast your opponent and win this fight.

+Bash damage increased by 25%% of Strength, blocked damage decreased by 50%% of Strength.
Lasts 5 turns.

name: Ninjutsu
description: Ninjutsu is a martial art and set of tactics used by ninja in feudal Japan.  It focuses on rapid, precise, silent strikes.  Ninjutsu is almost entirely silent and does extra damage if on the first attack.  It also provides small combat bonuses every time you move.
initiate: You perform a kuji-in mantra with your hands. Rin, Kai, Jin!
%s performs a series of intricate hand signs.

static_buffs.name: Ninjutsu Stance
static_buffs.description:
Your training allows you to make no noise when attacking and less noise when moving around.

Melee and unarmed attacks generate 0 noise.  Moving generates 1/2 as much noise.

static_buffs.name: Sneak Attack
static_buffs.description:
To a true shinobi, the first strike and the last strike are one in the same.

+50%% all damage.

onattack_buffs.name: Loss of Surprise
onattack_buffs.description:
You intentions are known!  It will take you a few moments to sneak attack again.

-50%% all damage.
Last 3 turns.

onmove_buffs.name: Momentum Shift
onmove_buffs.description:
Ninjas are training to be extremely agile and mobile.

+1.0 Dodge skill, Accuracy increased by 20%% of Dexterity.
Last 1 turn.

onkill_buffs.name: Escape Plan
onkill_buffs.description:
Your target has perished.  It is time to leave and plan your next attack.

+2 Dodge attempts, +10 movement speed.
Last 3 turns.

name: Niten Ichi-Ryu
description: Niten Ichi-Ryu is an ancient school of combat, transmitting a style of classical Japanese swordsmanship conceived by the warrior Miyamoto Musashi.  Perception increases damage and reduces blocked damage.  Moving and attacking reduces dodging and damage until you pause.  Pausing for a moment increases Dodge skill.
initiate: You clear your mind as you prepare yourself for combat.
%s relaxes and prepares for combat.

static_buffs.name: Niten Ichi-Ryu Stance
static_buffs.description:
Cautious watchful eyes
measure and display your skill.
Practice makes perfect.

Bash and Cut damage increased by 50%% of Perception, blocked damage reduced by 100%% of Perception.

onmove_buffs.name: Waning Moon
onmove_buffs.description:
Blackened like darkness,
nightmares approach from all sides.
Flee at any cost!

-5.0 Dodge skill.
Lasts 1 turn.

onattack_buffs.name: Falling Leaf
onattack_buffs.description:
A sharp sword cuts true.
Although, all things fade with time.
Restraint hones your skills.

-1.0 Dodge skill, -1 bash damage, -1 cut damage.
Lasts 1 turn. Stacks 5 times.

ondodge_buffs.name: Moonlight
ondodge_buffs.description:
Luck be the light,
on a dark and cloudy night
as the moon shines down

Enables "In-One Timing".
Lasts 1 turn.

onpause_buffs.name: Stillness
onpause_buffs.description:
The eye of the storm,
a fleeting moment of peace,
gone without a trace.

+2 Accuracy, Dodge skill increased by 50%% of Perception.
Lasts 2 turns.

name: Pankration
description: An ancient Greek martial art once used by the Spartans.  It combines boxing and wrestling techniques to create a brutal sport, though modern revival of the art is less of no-holds-barred in nature.
initiate: You crouch slightly and prepare to rush forward.
%s crouches slightly, ready to rush forward.

ondodge_buffs.name: Counter Chance
ondodge_buffs.description:
The enemy has presented an opening in their defense.
+10%% bash damage.  Enables "Close Combat" buff.
Lasts 1 turn.

onhit_buffs.name: Close Combat
onhit_buffs.description:
You got your opponent right where you want them!

+20%% bash damage.
Lasts 1 turn.

name: Tai Chi
description: Though Tai Chi is often seen as a form of mental and physical exercise, it is a legitimate martial art, focused on self-defense.  Its ability to absorb the force of an attack makes your Perception decrease damage further on a block.
initiate: You settle into a gentle stance and prepare to defend yourself.
%s settles into a gentle stance.

static_buffs.name: Tai Chi
static_buffs.description: +1 Block.  Perception decreases damage when blocking.

name: Taekwondo
description: Taekwondo is the national sport of Korea, and was used by the South Korean army in the 20th century.  Focused on kicks and so it does not benefit from wielded weapons.  It also includes strength training; your blocks absorb extra damage the stronger you are.
initiate: You adopt a narrow fighting stance.
You adopts a narrow fighting stance.

static_buffs.name: Taekwondo
static_buffs.description: Strength decreases damage when blocking.

name: Zui Quan
description: AKA "drunken boxing," Zui Quan imitates the movement of a drunk to confuse the enemy, giving you a passive dodge bonus based on your intelligence.  The turn after you attack, you may dodge any number of attacks with no penalty, and successfully dodging an attack gives you bonus damage and to-hit based on your intelligence.
initiate: You begin to sway to and fro with a confident swagger.
%s stumbles as if pretending to be drunk.

static_buffs.name: Zui Quan
static_buffs.description: Intelligence increases dodging ability

ondodge_buffs.name: Counter Strike
ondodge_buffs.description: Extra damage and to-hit after successful dodge

name: Silat
description: Pentjak Silat, of Indonesian origin, is a fighting style that covers the use of short blades and bludgeons.  Fighters stay low and mobile to avoid attacks, then unleash deadly critical hits.
initiate: You give a salute of respect as you prepare to combat.
%s gives a combat salute.

static_buffs.name: Silat Stance
static_buffs.description: +1 dodge

name: Tiger Kung Fu
description: One of the five Shaolin animal styles.  The Tiger focuses on relentless attacks above all else.  Your Strength determines your accuracy, and your attacks do increasing damage as you continue attacking.
initiate: You clench your hands into ferocious, tiger-like claws.
%s assumes a tiger-like stance.

static_buffs.name: Tiger Strength
static_buffs.description: Strength provides additional damage bonus.

name: Snake Kung Fu
description: One of the five Shaolin animal styles.  The Snake focuses on sinuous movement and precision strikes.  Your Perception improves your damage.
initiate: You adopt a fluid stance, ready to strike like a snake.
%s assumes a snake-like stance.

static_buffs.name: Snake Sight
static_buffs.description: Perception provides a bonus to damage.

name: Debug Mastery
description: A secret martial art used only by developers and cheaters.
initiate: You get ready pwn some zeds!
%s prepares to cheat at martial arts!

static_buffs.name: Elemental resistance
static_buffs.description: +Strength bash armor, +Dexterity acid armor, +Intelligence electricity armor, +Perception fire armor.

oncrit_buffs.name: Lightning Strike
oncrit_buffs.description: Lightning strikes twice.  +Perception electric damage for 3 turns.  Stacks 2 times.

onmiss_buffs.name: Getting Angry
onmiss_buffs.description: When I get my hands on you...  +2 bash damage for 2 turns.  Stacks 5 times.

onkill_buffs.name: On Fire
onkill_buffs.description: YOU ARE ON FIRE!  +5 fire damage for 5 turns.

name: Sōjutsu
description: Sōjutsu, "The Way of the Spear", is the Japanese martial art of fighting with a spear.  Sōjutsu focuses on keeping opponents at a distance in order to maintain advantage in combat.
initiate: You prepare to defend against all that approach you.
%s assumes a wide, defensive stance.

static_buffs.name: Sōjutsu Stance
static_buffs.description: Bonus block with reach weapons while standing still

onmove_buffs.name: Sōjutsu Rush
onmove_buffs.description: Increased damage when moving but no bonus block

name: Wing Chun
description: Wing Chun is a Chinese martial art that began by selecting the easiest-to-learn effective techniques from the various Shaolin animal forms.  It has a high stance, with weight entirely on the rear leg.  Wing Chun focuses on sensitivity to the opponent's direction of force, and flowing around it to get back to hitting.
initiate: You take your stance and prepare to receive the gift of violence.
%s patiently assumes a curiously pigeon-toed stance.

static_buffs.name: Chi-Sao Sensitivity
static_buffs.description: Perception increases dodging ability, +1 dodges per turn
